title: FS: T206 Shag Shaughnessy Piedmont 350 PSA 3 - Sale Pending
author: Promethius88

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Shag Shaughnessy Piedmont 350 PSA 3 - Sale Pending
posts.post_content: Not super anxious to sell but it's not a main focus of my collecting.  $475 delivered Paypal f&f.  Nicer than the PSA 3 that BBCE sold on Ebay recently, IMO, but I'm biased, lol.
Reducing to $450 before I stick it back in the drawer for a while.
